lines: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c13fd638>

lines: Peace is a day-to-day problem, the product of a multitude of events and judgments. Peace is not an ‘is,’ it is a ‘becoming.’
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c14121f0>

lines: Inner peace doesn’t come from getting what we want, but from remembering who we are.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1437950>

lines: Peace is its own reward.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1613648>

lines: It isn’t enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn’t enough to believe in it. One must work at it.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1623e30>

lines: Optimism is a strategy for making a better future. Because unless you believe that the future can be better, you are unlikely to step up and take responsibility for making it so.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c163de48>

lines: And you ask “what if I fall?" Oh but my darling, what if you fly?”
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1672dc8>

lines: It’s not that optimism solves all of life’s problems; it is just that it can sometimes make the difference between coping and collapsing.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c16902b0>

lines: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c16c2bc0>

lines: No pessimist ever discovered the secrets of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new heaven to the horizon of the spirit.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1716298>

lines: Stay afraid, but do it anyway. What’s important is the action. You don’t have to wait to be confident. Just do it and eventually the confidence will follow.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1734c70>

lines: One must have the adventurous daring to accept oneself as a bundle of possibilities and undertake the most interesting game in the world - making the most of one's best.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c175e318>

lines: Be proud to wear you.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1792f78>

lines: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence but it comes from within. It is there all the time.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c17c3128>

lines: Every small positive change we make in ourselves repays us in confidence in the future.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c17f8d00>

lines: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c18300c0>

lines: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1875508>

lines: Love in action is service.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c18a09b0>

lines: Where there is love there is life.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c18d03e0>

lines: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c190ad88>

lines: A friend may be waiting behind a stranger’s face.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c194d818>

lines: Wherever we are, it is our friends that make our world.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1993d68>

lines: Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you; spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c19d4318>

lines: There’s not a word yet for old friends who’ve just met.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1a27748>

lines: There are good ships and wood ships, ships that sail the sea, but the best ships are friendships, may they always be!
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1a5d410>

lines: At 211 degrees, water is hot. At 212 degrees, it boils. And with boiling water, comes steam. And with steam, you can power a train.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1a894e8>

lines: The key of persistence opens all doors closed by resistance.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1ab8658>

lines: You keep putting one foot in front of the other, and then one day you look back and you've climbed a mountain.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1af2df8>

lines: To persist with a goal, you must treasure the dream more than the costs of sacrifice to attain it.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1b1c6a8>

lines: Failure cannot cope with persistence.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1b55458>

lines: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1b806a8>

lines: A highly developed values system is like a compass. It serves as a guide to point you in the right direction when you are lost.
author: <Author:0x00007fe3c1bb2748>
